titleStmt.title: An Abridgment of the prerogatives of St. Ann, mother of the mother of God with the approbation of the doctors at Paris, and thence done into English to accompany The contemplations on the life and glory of Holy Mary, and the defence of the same, with some pieces of a like nature : to which a preface is added concerning the original of the story.

An Abridgment of the prerogatives of St. Ann, mother of the mother of God with the approbation of the doctors at Paris, and thence done into English to accompany The contemplations on the life and glory of Holy Mary, and the defence of the same, with some pieces of a like nature : to which a preface is added concerning the original of the story.
titleStmt.author: Cross, John, 1630-1689. Contemplations on the life and glory of Holy Mary the mother of Jesus.
Clagett, William, 1646-1688.

notesStmt.note: "Imprimatur ... Feb. l4, 1687. Guil. Needham ... D.D. Wilhelmo ..."
Translation and preface ascribed to William Clagett.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

person.persName: Anne, (Mother of the Virgin Mary), Saint
